descriptionSet.description: Pn this advertisement for Steuart & Co., a coach can be seen in the center of the image. On the right and left upper sections, logos can be seen. On the lower section, contact details of the company advertising are depicted.

inscription.text: Established 1775 Coach and Motor Body Builders Motor Car Engineers By special appointment to His Majesty the King=Emperor
As built for H.M. the King-Emperor. Steuart & Co., 3, Mangoe Lane, Calcutta.

location.name: Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art
Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art

rights.text: Copyrighted. Copyright with the original artists and publishers.
